name: Restless Night (itch)
description:
This game was initially made for the GameOff Jam 2021 in roughly one month.

Your goal is to find a safe place to stay for the night. Explore your sourroundings, find clues and try to avoid what lurkes in the dark.

For my part I love horror games and wanted to create a immersive experience.

Lots of fun!

I recommend playing with headphones.















UPDATE 01:  

Because I got some more time before the jam is over I changed and added some things trying to improve the player experience. 

  • added streetlamp glow when recharging
  • added more text events 
  • added small glow stones for guidance
  • charge event message only happens after leaving starting area
  • improved pause menu navigation
